title: Rep. Katie Porter
description: Samantha Bee talks to Representative Katie Porter about sending kids to school in a pandemic, why all the old dudes in Congress don't understand childcare, and why her kids will NEVER paint their nails on her bedspread.
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
content:encoded: Samantha Bee talks to Representative Katie Porter about sending kids to school in a pandemic, why all the old dudes in Congress don't understand childcare, and why her kids will NEVER paint their nails on her bedspread.
